content.prompt: The ordinances in the passage best exemplify which of the following aspects of Calvinism?

choices.label: The recognition of the desirability of religious toleration in mixed-faith communities
The belief that laws must be based on religious principles
The belief in the predestination of the elect to salvation

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
